{{user good}} }} Karolina Węgrzyn 'Sirielle' is a self taught artist with education in social sciences field. She prefers to work in digital medium with a graphic tablet. ''Quenta Silmarillion'' is her favourite tale among the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. In the fandom she is long time contributor and since January 2012 co-admin of the [http://forum.tolkien.com.pl/ ''Hobbiton''] forum, the oldest Polish Tolkien fans forum. Karolina has also contributed in Polish project [http://tolkien.com.pl/ennorath/ Ennorath] and since June 2006 continues to admin [http://silmarillion-club.deviantart.com/ Silmarillion club] at deviantART. Associate and since Autumn 2013 member of the editorial staff of the Polish Tolkienists Almanac ''[[Aiglos (journal)|Aiglos]]''. ==See also== * [[:Category: Images by Karolina Węgrzyn]] ==External links== * '''[http://www.sirielle.com/ Official Website]''' * [http://www.facebook.com/sirielleart/ ''Art of Karolina Węgrzyn'' at Facebook] * [http://sirielle.deviantart.com/ Karolina Węgrzyn at deviantArt]
